page.title: 06Farming Babraham/ Sawston
page.content: The majority of the area in our block is covered by farm land.{Babraham}farm is typical of those in the area. {Area:}635 hectares arable land;582 hectares deciduous plantations; 1 resevoir. {Main crops:}Wheat, potatoes, malt- barley, oil-seed rape, sugar-beet. {Machinery:}8 tractors, 2 combines, 1potato planter, 1 potato harvester 2 fork lift trucks 3 irrigators 2 ploughs 5 cultivating machines 7 trailers. {Buildings:}Potato sorting and storage barn; grain store; machinery sheds; 10 houses,5 used by farm employees, the rest let; 2 flats. {Farming programme 1985:}45 wheat fields; 4 barley; 6 potatoes; 15 sugar-beet; 5 Oil-seed rape; 1 onion; 7 field-surrounds of Jerusalem artichokes.
